articles.title: Any US tightening hurts India output no matter what policymakers do here: RBI paper - The Economic Times
articles.description: It is evident from the impulse responses that the domestic economy faces an immediate decline in output due to a contractionary US monetary policy shock,  they said.
articles.content: Irrespective of what the Indian policy makers do to lift the economic activity, any monetary tightening action by the US leads to a contraction of output in India, a Reserve Bank of India paper said.… [+2689 chars]
